title: BTC Monk
author: BTC Monk
content: Faces of Bitcoin artwork on auction!Â  https://scarce.city/auctions/faces-of-bitcoin-artworkCreative processhttps://youtu.be/Eo6belZugBIMore art onhttps://twitter.com/BTCmonk1Faces of Bitcoin is a pyrography artwork which was burned on plywood, gilded with 23 carat gold leaf and varnished with matte varnish.While studying an ancient tribal arts I noticed that indigenous people around the world were depicting one single entity with different faces representing different characteristics of that one entity.As we all know The Great Bitcoin has different faces and characteristics too. When it rises, its progress, growth, expansion and when it falls, its regress, stagnation and even fear.So let me represent you the one and only, authentic artwork: Faces of Bitcoin!It took 200 hours to finish this artwork. It was burned on plywood, gilded with 23 carat gold leaf and varnished with matte varnish. Framed in authentic wooden frame.Dimensions 82 x 55 cm (32.2 x 21.6 inch)
